content:
What is a Channel Manager?

What the channel manager does is keeping control of the availability in your hotel and keeps everything updated in all channels, minimising the risk for overbooking. 

Assume you have 30 rooms in your hotel, and 28 rooms are occupied. Then you get a booking in from Booking.com. The channel manager will then update the availability so you have 1 room left to sell in all channels. 

The channel manager also keeps track of cancellations, so you won't have to deal with that either.
